601350.name: Fantasy Grounds - Disposable Heroes: Modern Gangs (Token Pack)
601350.description:
Disposable Heroes Modern Gangs

Fantasy Token Pack
This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy
Grounds II virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear
in your Token box for use throughout your game. They have been organized by genre
and product name to make it easy to use multiple token pack modules within your
game. Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures:
32x32, 50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality
that best meets your needs.
This set contains full-color token representations of modern gang figures focusing
on thugs, gangsters, gangbangers, and cops, Beautifully illustrated and colored
by Joshua Cayne. Two formats are included: full-body figures and top-cropped figures
for a larger image.
This pack contains tokens for the following characters:
  • Drug Addict
  • Drug Dealer 1
  • Drug Dealer 2
  • Hooded Assailant
  • Pickpocket
  • Prostitute
  • Gangster Boss
  • Gangster Hitman
  • Gangster Thug 1
  • Gangster Thug 2
  • Gangster Thug 3
  • Punk 1
  • Punk 2
  • Punk 3
  • Red Gangbanger Boss
  • Red Gangbanger Lieutenant
  • Red Gangbanger Thug 1
  • Red Gangbanger Thug 2
  • Blue Gangbanger Boss
  • Blue Gangbanger Lieutenant
  • Blue Gangbanger Thug 1
  • Blue Gangbanger Thug 2
  • Mercenary 1
  • Mercenary 2
  • Mercenary 3
  • Police Detective
  • Police Officer
  • Police Swat 1
  • Police Swat 2
  • Police Agent
Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Brett M. Bernstein
Other downloadable and printed Disposable Heroes paper miniatures and counters,
as well as other quality products, can be found at .
Ruleset Compatibility: Any
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
